body_html: Hi there, and excuse me for posting on a closed Issue. Thus, Supervisor will be deprecated soon and MonitoredTrainingSession is the way future way to load/save models and write summaries? Cheers!

body: Hi there, and excuse me for posting on a closed Issue. Thus, `Supervisor` will be deprecated soon and `MonitoredTrainingSession` is the way future way to load/save models and write summaries? Cheers!
